item.description:
Your Chakra's and You

Come join Tracy on an in-depth discussion to learn what each of your seven chakra's are,
what they do, and how to determine if you have any imbalances, and how this can affect your life.
The class will include discussion, methods, and exercises to heal and regain balance in each of
your chakra's. Come and learn how to understand yourself and others through the chakra's.
This class will not only help you to understand the chakra's, but will help heal you physically, emotionally, mentally, and spiritually.

There will be (4) classes, taught every Friday evening in October,
from 7:00- 9:00 p.m. at Terrapin Traders in Gardner, Mass.

Each class is $20: $80 for the entire course.

The class schedule is as follows:

Class 1- Friday, Oct 3rd

Introduction to the Chakra's

• What are the chakra's
• How the chakra's work separately and together
• Universal Energy
• Using the Chakra's to understand and forgive yourself and others
• Setting Goals
• Overview of the Chakra's

Root Chakra

• Location
• Core drives
• Signs of Imbalance
• Recognizing your personal imbalance
• Developmental age of the chakra
• What balance looks like
• How imbalance may have occurred
• How to work toward achieving balance
• The negative Emotion that keeps us pulls us into imbalance
• Meditations and activities

Class 2- Friday, Oct 10th

Class 4- Friday, Oct 24th
